content.title: Thank You for Your Support! Special Bonus Unlocked!🎉
content.creator:
Edgelet
March 18, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
We’re beyond excited to share this amazing news with you! Our campaign has now received the enthusiastic support of over 400 backers, surpassing $20,000 in funding! This is a huge milestone for us, and we sincerely appreciate your trust and support! 💙
🎁 A Special Thank-You Gift!
To show our gratitude, we’ve decided to include a special keyring with every ScytheBlade ! This isn’t just a handy little tool—it also symbolizes our connection with you. We hope it becomes a part of your everyday life.
We’ve seen so many EDC enthusiasts and design lovers recognizing our work and sharing their thoughts and suggestions. This reassures us that our product can bring joy and value to even more people. If you love it too, help us spread the word! You can just copy our campaign link, https://bit.ly/3Y0zj1V, to share it with your friends on social media. You can also join our Kickbooster program and earn a 13% commission by sharing the campaign.Your support gives us the motivation to keep moving forward. To express our gratitude, we’re excited to reward our backers who help spread the word, rather than spending the money on additional advertising.

👉 Earn 13% cash back for helping ScytheBlade spread the word!
🔓 Mystery Gift Unlocked at $35,000!
Our next goal is $35,000! Once we hit this milestone, we’ll unlock a mystery gift for all backers! 🎁 Could it be an exclusive EDC accessory?  Or something completely unexpected? 🤔 What do you think it might be? Let’s find out together!
We’ll reveal the mystery gift as we get closer to the goal—stay tuned! 😉
Once again, thank you all for your incredible support! Let’s push forward to the next milestone! 💪🔥
Best regards,
Edgelet Team

comments.text: In what way is this keyring special? It looks like a dime a dozen keyring.

Thank you for your feedback! This keyring is designed to be compact and well-suited for pairing with the knife. Our goal is to provide a practical accessory that makes it easier to carry and use the knife in daily life. If you have any suggestions, we’d love to hear them—we’re always open to ideas from our backers!
